name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write exit time on eTempo Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expand the information on the eTempo webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension add new information on the eTempo Web Page.
If you have paired times, it will tell you the total time worked.
If you have unpaired times, it will tell you the current exit time.
You can configure diferent times for diferent days.
By default, all days will be set to 8 hours.

It will tell you also the total unworked time.

Source Code:
https://github.com/victormartinezsimon/eTempoAddon

Actual Version: 
0.1.7: Fix small bugs
